panels.description: Number of brokers that are online in the Kafka cluster
panels.title: Brokers online

panels.description: How many replica leaders fall in each of the Kafka brokers. There should not be big differences among the load in each of the brokers
panels.title: Replica leader distribution

panels.description: Number of replicas that are offline (have no leader at the moment). Should always be zero
panels.title: Offline Replica Count

panels.description: Number of underreplicated partitions per Kafka broker
panels.title: Underreplicated partitions

panels.description: Number of bytes received by the Kafka cluster, per broker. Amount should be similar per broker
panels.title: Cluster Bytes In

panels.description: Number of bytes sent by the Kafka cluster, per broker. Amount should be similar per broker. Includes replication traffic
panels.title: Cluster Bytes Out
Incoming Messages per Minute per Topic
Messages Consumed per Minute per Group
